org.andengine.util.algorithm.hull

Class JarvisMarch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.andengine.util.algorithm.hull.JarvisMarch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHullAlgorithm

    public class JarvisMarch
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHullAlgorithm
    The Jarvis March algorithm marches around the hull, like a ribbon wrapping itself around the points, this algorithm also called the gift-wrapping algorithm. (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
    Since:
    14:01:18 - 14.09.2010
    Author:
    Nicolas Gramlich
    See Also:
    http://www.iti.fh-flensburg.de/lang/algorithmen/geo/

    • Method Detail

      • computeHull

        public int computeHull(float[] pVertices,
              int pVertexCount,
              int pVertexOffsetX,
              int pVertexOffsetY,
              int pVertexStride)
        Specified by:
        computeHull in interface IHullAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        pVertices - a interleaved float[] containing vertex data.
        pVertexCount - the amount of vertices to look at in pVertices.
        pVertexOffsetX - the offset of the x-coordinate in a vertex.
        pVertexOffsetY - the offset of the y-coordinate in a vertex.
        pVertexStride - the stride between each vertex.
        Returns:
